empty.title: No AllDom pack
empty.description: You don't have any AllDom pack on this account.
empty.selectDescription: Choose a pack from the list to see its details.

domains.title: Pack domain names
domains.name: Domain name
domains.terminateInfo: Domains not terminated will no longer be attached to the pack after expiration. They will be renewed at standard rate.

terminateWarning.title: Termination scheduled
terminateWarning.message: Your pack will expire on {{date}}. Domains not terminated will be renewed for free until this date, then billed individually.

terminate.title: Terminate pack {{serviceName}}
terminate.subtitle: You can terminate all your domains or keep some in individual management.
terminate.keepDomainsInfo: Unselected domains will no longer be attached to the pack. You will lose the preferential rate.
terminate.warningTitle: Warning, the following services will be terminated:
terminate.noDomainsSelected: You chose to terminate your pack {{serviceName}} while keeping your domains.

cancelTerminate.title: Cancel termination
cancelTerminate.message: Do you want to cancel the termination of pack {{serviceName}}?
